titles.title: In the matter of Representative David Schweikert.
In the matter of Representative David Schweikert.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1074.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution adopts the report of the Committee on Ethics dated July 30, 2020, and titled In the Matter of Allegations Relating to Representative David Schweikert. (Among other things, the report recommends a reprimand and a fine.)
